column4: hi, i just upgrade a ubuntu studio to ubuntu 10.20 after update my laptotp touchpad is not working, can anybody help?
hi, i just upgrade a ubuntu studio to ubuntu 10.20 after update my laptotp touchpad is not working, can anybody help?
is there a button to disable and enable the touchpad, have you tried toggling the button?
this would be a button on your touchpad, it was a question?
is your touchpad connected to a laptop or is it separate

there is no button to turn on your touchpad on your laptop.  This is correct?
let me chek on my laptop
i dont think so that i have xserver-xorg-input-syanaptics
